{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Orange |model=Livebox |revision=2.1 |asin= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=ARV7519 |manuf_rev=RW22 |availability= |pcb_id=141751920003J |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.66 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80920;XWAY VRX288, (PSB 80920, EL V1.1); |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL256ELT2I-90Q |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWVB-25H |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip1_model=PSB 8231;XWAY WAVE300, (PSB8231, EL V1.1); |wi1_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip2_model=PSB 8304;XWAY WAVE300, (PSB 8304, V1.1); |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip2_model=PEF 7071V |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=ADSL/VSDL AFE Chip;Lantiq;PSB 80208;PSB 80208, V V1.1 (ARX208);1; ,,, VoIP Telephony Chip;Lantiq;PEF 42068;PEF 42068, V V1.2 (XWAY SLIC120);1; |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=74:31:70 |oui_eth=74:31:70 }} {{TagLine|Wireless ADSL Gateway}} :[http://ayuda.orange.es/internet/configuracion-y-descargas/routers-y-modems/nuevo-livebox.html On '''Orange''' site] (aka ''nuevo Livebox'')
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=39074 ''Orange Livebox 2.1'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :"P/N: 141751920003J R01" is silkscreened on the board in the images :74:31:70 OUI on the label, assumed 74:31:70 OUI for both interfaces :OEM Model: [[Arcadyan]] ARV7519RW22-A-LT :*[[Lantiq]] PEF 42068 V V1.2 (XWAY SLIC120) telephony chip :*[[Lantiq]] PSB 80208 V V1.1 (ARX208) A/VSDL AFE :Most of the specs in here are courtesy of forum users [http://foro.seguridadwireless.net/openwrt/astoria-networks-arv7519-de-ya-com-ahora-orange/ here] and [http://foro.seguridadwireless.net/openwrt/astoria-networks-arv7519-de-ya-com-ahora-orange/ here]
{{See also|Orange|Arcadyan ARV7519RW22|Arcadyan}}
===Reviews=== *[http://www.redeszone.net/routers/nuevo-router-multimedia-livebox-analisis-del-nuevo-router-de-orange-con-wi-fi-n-a-300mbps/ Review on '''RedesZone'''] (ES) (internal pictures) :''Astoria Networks'' is the brand on the label, :but the device manufactured by [[Arcadyan]] :*[[Lantiq]] PSB 80208 V V1.1 (ARX208) ASDL chip :*[[Lantiq]] PEF 42068 VoIP chip *[http://www.xatakaon.com/modems-y-routers/nuevo-router-multimedia-livebox-de-orange-lo-hemos-probado On '''xatakaon.com'''](ES) :Chip markings: :* Wi-Fi BB+MAC chip: XWAY WAVE300 (PSB8231EL V1.1) (3x3 PCIe) :* Wi-Fi RF chip: XWAY WAVE300 (PSB 8304 V1.1) (3x3 2.4GHz) :This device has 1 Gigabit Ethernet LAN port
<!--{{lowercase}}--> __NOTOC__
